sentences: She diagnoses a patient every morning during her hospital rounds.
She does not diagnose a patient until all lab results are back.
Does she diagnose a patient when new symptoms suddenly appear?
Doesn't she diagnose a patient whenever an emergency case arrives?
She is diagnosing a patient right now while consulting the radiology images.
She is not diagnosing a patient at the moment because the CT scan is still processing.
Is she diagnosing a patient in the isolation ward this afternoon?
Isn't she diagnosing a patient even though the vital signs are unstable?
She has diagnosed a patient with a rare condition three times this year.
She has not diagnosed a patient since returning from the overseas conference.
Has she diagnosed a patient using the new AI decision tool?
Hasn't she diagnosed a patient with COVID-19 recently?
She has been diagnosing a patient for the past hour without taking a break.
She has not been diagnosing a patient because she is updating treatment guidelines.
Has she been diagnosing a patient remotely via telemedicine since dawn?
Hasn't she been diagnosing a patient continuously during the night shift?
She diagnosed a patient last night even after her shift had ended.
She did not diagnose a patient yesterday because she was in surgery all day.
Did she diagnose a patient when the power outage occurred?
Didn't she diagnose a patient just before the code blue?
She was diagnosing a patient when the lab phoned in the critical values.
She was not diagnosing a patient that afternoon; she was teaching residents instead.
Was she diagnosing a patient at six o’clock as scheduled?
Wasn't she diagnosing a patient when you called her earlier?
She had diagnosed a patient before the attending physician arrived.
She had not diagnosed a patient by the time the ambulance brought another case.
Had she diagnosed a patient with sepsis earlier that day?
Hadn't she diagnosed a patient before prescribing antibiotics?
She had been diagnosing a patient for hours when the final culture results confirmed her suspicion.
She had not been diagnosing a patient because the imaging machine was down.
Had she been diagnosing a patient nonstop until the shift change?
Hadn't she been diagnosing a patient until the pager went silent?
She will diagnose a patient tomorrow during the outreach clinic.
She will not diagnose a patient tonight because she is off duty.
Will she diagnose a patient if the triage nurse flags a critical case?
Won't she diagnose a patient once the lab data has loaded?
She will be diagnosing a patient at this time next Wednesday.
She will not be diagnosing a patient during the annual conference.
Will she be diagnosing a patient when the health inspectors visit?
Won't she be diagnosing a patient while the interns observe?
She will have diagnosed a patient by Friday.
She will not have diagnosed a patient if the lab strike continues.
Will she have diagnosed a patient before the treatment meeting?
Won't she have diagnosed a patient by the time we finalize the protocol?
She will have been diagnosing a patient for eight hours by the shift handover.
She will not have been diagnosing a patient all day if the system outage persists.
Will she have been diagnosing a patient continuously until the consultant arrives?
Won't she have been diagnosing a patient for weeks when the clinical trial concludes?
korean: 그녀는 매일 아침 회진에서 환자를 진단한다.
모든 검사 결과가 나올 때까지 그녀는 환자를 진단하지 않는다.
새로운 증상이 갑자기 나타나면 그녀가 환자를 진단하나요?
응급 환자가 들어오면 그녀는 환자를 진단하지 않나요?
그녀는 지금 방사선 이미지를 보며 환자를 진단하고 있다.
CT 스캔이 처리 중이라 그녀는 현재 환자를 진단하고 있지 않다.
오늘 오후 격리 병동에서 그녀가 환자를 진단하고 있나요?
활력 징후가 불안정한데도 그녀는 환자를 진단하고 있지 않나요?
그녀는 올해 희귀 질환 환자를 세 번이나 진단했다.
해외 학회에서 돌아온 뒤로 그녀는 환자를 진단하지 않았다.
새 AI 의사결정 도구로 환자를 진단했나요?
최근에 코로나 환자를 진단하지 않았나요?
그녀는 한 시간째 쉬지 않고 환자를 진단해 오고 있다.
진료 지침을 개정하느라 그녀는 환자를 진단하지 못하고 있다.
새벽부터 원격으로 환자를 진단해 왔나요?
야간 근무 동안 그녀는 계속 환자를 진단하고 있지 않았나요?
그녀는 어젯밤 근무가 끝난 뒤에도 환자를 진단했다.
하루 종일 수술로 어제 그녀는 환자를 진단하지 못했다.
정전이 발생했을 때 그녀는 환자를 진단했나요?
코드 블루 직전에 그녀는 환자를 진단하지 않았나요?
중요 검사값 연락이 왔을 때 그녀는 환자를 진단하고 있었다.
그 오후 그녀는 레지던트를 교육하느라 환자를 진단하고 있지 않았다.
예정된 여섯 시에 그녀는 환자를 진단하고 있었나요?
조금 전 당신이 전화했을 때 그녀는 환자를 진단하고 있지 않았나요?
주치의가 도착하기 전에 그녀는 이미 환자를 진단해 두었다.
구급차가 또 환자를 실어 올 때까지 그녀는 환자를 진단하지 못했다.
그날 오전 그녀는 패혈증 환자를 진단했었나요?
항생제를 처방하기 전에 그녀는 환자를 진단하지 않았었나요?
최종 배양 결과가 의심을 확인했을 때 그녀는 몇 시간째 환자를 진단 중이었다.
영상 장비 고장으로 그녀는 환자를 진단하지 못하고 있었다.
교대 시간까지 그녀는 쉬지 않고 환자를 진단하고 있었나요?
호출기가 조용해질 때까지 그녀는 환자를 진단하고 있지 않았나요?
내일 그녀는 외래 진료소에서 환자를 진단할 것이다.
오늘 밤 그녀는 비번이라 환자를 진단하지 않을 것이다.

전문의가 도착할 때까지 그녀는 계속 환자를 진단하고 있게 될까요?
임상 시험이 끝날 즈음 그녀는 몇 주째 환자를 진단하고 있지 않을까요?
